author: Emma Ockerman, Michael Learmonth
title: This Hero Landlord Canceled Rent for 3 Months, Tells Tenants to Go Spend at Local Businesses
description: Tenants across his 12 properties will not have to worry about rent for April, May, and June.
content:
A New Jersey landlord recently told his tenants hed cancel rent for the next three months, asking only that they pay it forward by supporting local businesses during the coronavirus pandemic.
We should all do our part, and its something we can do. It provide… [+2160 chars]
